# Setup
```{r, echo  = FALSE}
file <- "https://github.com/datalorax/esvis/raw/master/data/benchmarks.rda"
load(url(file))
head(benchmarks)

library(tidyverse)

benchmarks <- benchmarks %>%
	as_tibble() %>%
	mutate(wave = case_when(season == "Fall" ~ 0,
	                        season == "Winter" ~ 1,
	                        TRUE ~ 2))
```


```{r, echo  = FALSE}
by_id <- split(benchmarks, benchmarks$sid)



models <- map(by_id, ~lm(math~wave, data = .x))
coefs <- map(models, coef)
slope <- map_dbl(coefs, 2)
int <- map_dbl(coefs, 1)

to_plot <- cbind(slope, int) %>% 
  na.omit() %>% 
  data.frame


ggplot(benchmarks, aes(wave, math)) +
  geom_abline(
    aes(intercept = int, 
        slope = slope), 
    size = 0.01, 
    data = to_plot
  ) +
  geom_smooth(
    method = "lm",
    se = FALSE,
    color = "magenta",
    size = 2
  ) +
  scale_x_continuous(
    limits = c(0, 2),
    breaks = 0:2,
    labels = c("Fall", "Winter", "Spring")
  ) +
  scale_y_continuous(
    limits = c(115, 300)
  )

```
